title: U.S. arms exports 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars, containing a total of 19 data points.
Overall Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars, about 12485.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars about 4953.0 was reached at Year 2002
